Desc.entry: Mixed martial arts consisting of karate and kickboxing. Offers self-defence, ground work, pad work and free fighting for all ages. Personal training by appointment. First aid qualified.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 8.30-9.30pm (adults), Tues 6.30-7.30pm (mixed class), Wed 7.30-8.30pm (mixed class), Sat 12.15-1.15pm (juniors and adults)

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - COMBINATION, KICK BOXING AND THAI BOXING
MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
